graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:BusinessPartnerPortalCreatePaymentModeInput!)
{
	businessPartnerPortalCreatePaymentMode (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		code
		name
		description
		type
		isAccountNumberRequired
		isRoutingInfoRequired
		isRecurringSupported
		sort
		isActive
		meta
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	businessPartnerPortalGetPaymentModes (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		code
		name
		description
		type
		isAccountNumberRequired
		isRoutingInfoRequired
		isRecurringSupported
		sort
		isActive
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	businessPartnerPortalFindPaymentMode (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		code
		name
		description
		type
		isAccountNumberRequired
		isRoutingInfoRequired
		isRecurringSupported
		sort
		isActive
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	businessPartnerPortalFindPaymentModeById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		code
		name
		description
		type
		isAccountNumberRequired
		isRoutingInfoRequired
		isRecurringSupported
		sort
		isActive
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
